statements.select: select * from PCEarplugsResilienceCheckDetail where PCEarplugsResilienceCheckId=#value# order by Number

select pcd.* from PCEarplugsResilienceCheckDetail pcd left join InvoiceXO xo on pcd.InvoiceXOId=xo.InvoiceId where PCEarplugsResilienceCheckId in (select PCEarplugsResilienceCheckId from PCEarplugsResilienceCheck where PCEarplugsResilienceCheckDate between #startDate# and #endDate#) and (ProductId=#productId# or #productId# is null) and (xo.CustomerInvoiceXOId=#cusXOId# or #cusXOId# is null) order by pcd.Number
